typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		businessNumber as string,
		year as integer,
		fiscalPeriodEnd as string,
		formId as integer,
		designationCode as string,
		categoryCode as integer,
		legalName as string,
		accountName as string,
		registrationDate as string,
		{address.street} as string,
		{address.city} as string,
		{address.province} as string,
		{address.postalCode} as string,
		{address.country} as string,
		contactName as string,
		contactPhone as string,
		contactEmail as string,
		contactUrl as string,
		{fields.300} as integer,
		{fields.305} as integer,
		{fields.310} as integer,
		{fields.315} as integer,
		{fields.320} as integer,
		{fields.325} as string,
		{fields.330} as string,
		{fields.335} as string,
		{fields.340} as string,
		{fields.345} as string,
		{fields.370} as integer,
		{fields.380} as integer,
		{fields.390} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	multiLineRow: true,
	wildcardPaths:['*.csv']) ~> CRA
source(output(
		value as (fiscalPeriodEnd as string, year as integer, businessNumber as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true,
	throughput: 400) ~> State
CRA, State lookup(concat('charity||', businessNumber) == id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
